data.message: hey facebook: instead of this loser-iffic "groups" idea to complicate the site even more, let me suggest one thing you should do... just ONE... it's pretty HUGE... it's pretty basic however... here it is, your ready, are you sure? ok here i...t is: give us the option to OPT OUT of getting 3,000 emails when something we "liked" or commented on, gets also commented on, by a bajillion other people after us, people we don't give a crap about &  probably don't know, whose comments we don't wanna know... SERIOUSLY, this feature exists on so many blogs out there... REALLY??! you still haven't figured that out yet? #unbelievable
